text: Paraitra maha paraitra mahara binimayata. Yara paraitrata alanghaniya tara aramanana kicacara antarbhukta. Eteke yiye tomalokaka akramana karaiba tomaloke'o taka anuraupa akramana karaiba arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaiba; arau jani thoraa, niscaya allaha muttakbisakalara lagata ache
